title: Algorithmic Trading with Whaleer
subtitle: Create, test, run, and share strategies with Whaleer. Follow the steps below to get started!

1.title: 1. Create Your Strategy
1.desc: Easily build your own algorithmic strategy using the Python-based editor. Define your rules with indicators like RSI, MACD.

2.title: 2. Test with Backtest
2.desc: Test your strategy on historical data. Instantly see the results and analyze its performance.

3.title: 3. Run the Bot
3.desc: Execute your strategy in real-time with live market data. Let the system trade on your behalf.

4.title: 4. Archive and Market
4.desc: Archive your strategies, compare their past performance. Rent or sell them if you like.
